cont.entity_a: Basic functionality is liked, but it burns the bottom and leaves the inside not completely cooked.
cont.entity_b: Machine is defective with consistent poor results across multiple attempts.

cont.entity_a: The recipe book is highly detailed with times and instructions for adding ingredients.
cont.entity_b: Recipes provided can be adapted for preferred flavors.

cont.entity_a: Bread requires manual intervention during mixing to avoid flour not being mixed properly.
Consistent performance over 3.5 years of use.
Large size and loaves come out with a thick crust even on the light setting.
cont.entity_b: Compact design fits well in small kitchens. Small loaf size is suitable for small families.

cont.entity_a: The paddle can become loose and detach during the cycle.
cont.entity_b: Paddle can get stuck and requires careful extraction.

cont.entity_a: A grinding noise occurs during the baking phase.
cont.entity_b: Bread is consistently well-baked with minimal noise.

cont.entity_a: Convection feature bakes a crispy crust with three loaf size choices. Convection feature leads to over-browning if not monitored.
Brushed stainless steel finish is attractive and easy to clean.
cont.entity_b: Machine is compact and fits well in small spaces.

cont.entity_a: Recipes can be adjusted for high altitude baking with success.
cont.entity_b: Requires careful recipe adaptation for best results.

cont.entity_a: Gluten-free bread setting works well. Bread burns on one side over time.
cont.entity_b: Produces dry bread with some recipes.

cont.entity_a: Pan can become loose over time with heavy use.
cont.entity_b: Inside bowl surface scratches easily; avoid metal utensils.

cont.entity_a: Customer service was helpful in replacing defective units.
Some units may have quality control issues.
Provides a good knead and rise cycle.
cont.entity_b: Quick Cycle does not beep for add-ins.

cont.entity_a: The included recipe book is not highly regarded; additional cookbooks recommended.

cont.entity_b: Crust option is not available for all settings.

cont.entity_a: Bread maker is not completely hands-off, requires monitoring.
cont.entity_b: Quiet operation and compact size are appreciated.
Useful for allergy-friendly bread with minimal supervision.
Timer function allows for fresh bread in the morning. Lacks a pocket for yeast, affecting timer function use.
